name: The Red Infection (WeeklyGameJam version)
description:
This is my entery for the WeeklyGameJam 227! This is my 2nd Game Jam!

The Theme was "Protect it!"

There are still many bugs in my game.

Try and protect it and yourself from getting infected by the red infection!

.

Controls:

WASD - move

E - use Lazer Amo

Left / Right mouse click - shoot bullet

.

Music "MusicTest1" was made by Maexchenoo9
